Source code for deeptextworld.log

import logging
import logging.config



[docs]class Logging(object):

    def __init__(self, name=None):
        if name is None:
            cls_name = self.__class__.__name__
            module_name = self.__module__
            name = '{}.{}'.format(module_name, cls_name)
        self.__logger = logging.getLogger(name)


[docs]    def info(self, msg, *args, **kwargs):
        self.__logger.info(msg, *args, **kwargs)



[docs]    def debug(self, msg, *args, **kwargs):
        self.__logger.debug(msg, *args, **kwargs)



[docs]    def warning(self, msg, *args, **kwargs):
        self.__logger.warn(msg, *args, **kwargs)



[docs]    def error(self, msg, *args, **kwargs):
        self.__logger.error(msg, *args, **kwargs)
